page.title: 03LIVING IN BOW VILLAGE
page.content: My name is Tina Ann Yelland and I am ten.I have lived in Bow all my life and so has my Mum.She has six sisters and four brothers and they all live in Bow except for two sisters who live in near by villages. Four still live at my Nan's and are not married.My Dad has lived in Bow 31 yrs and he has four brothers.My Mum is a dinner lady at school and my Dad is a concrete lorry driver.I have two pets, one cat called Pussy and a fish called Bubble.I play the piano and the guitar.When I get older I want to be a secretary.In winter I join Badminton and Kimbers (Chapel Youth Gospel Group).Sometimes we go on holiday in our tent.This year we went to a caravan in Cornwall and I made friends with a girl from Plymouth and we are writng letters to each other.
